title: Tornado Transformation SFX: Pack1
description: Transforming SFX for typhoon, tornado-like and similar VFX
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO


Introducing Tornado Transformation SFX: Pack 1


Despite the name suggesting this pack is tailored for tornado or typhoon-like transformation sound effects, it is versatile enough to be used for almost any type of transitions or transformations of characters or objects you can imagine.


In the immersive realms of adventure, magic, and fantasy gaming, these sound effects capture the essence of nature’s elements—fire, water, wind, and ice—as well as magical and mixed elements.


Each sound type is systematically organized into three folders:


  • Full: Contains ready-to-use sounds in various lengths and variations, offering multiple options based on duration and flow while maintaining a similar tonality.


  • Loops: Provides looping options for infinite capabilities. Tip: When using loops, enhance the impact by adding various short SFX from the pack at the attack and release points to create a powerful launch and a smooth release.


  • Short SFX: Mostly one-shots that can be used for various transitions, transformations, and for attack and release sounds in looping situations, with multiple variations based on duration and flow but maintaining a similar tonality.


Note: Tornado animations in the YouTube video are for presentation purposes only.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 189

Number of Audio Waves: 189 + 189 + 189

Number of Audio Cues: 189 + 189 + 189

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, looping sounds are also included

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 17:09

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
